SEARCH
Package vendingMachineSimulator

Class SpecialItem

java.lang.Object
vendingMachineSimulator.Item
vendingMachineSimulator.SpecialItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class SpecialItem extends Item implements Cloneable
Represents a special item in the vending machine. Special items are customizable items that can have base items and optional addons. The user can choose to skip adding addons or add them up to a specified limit.
Author:
Vance Gyan M. Robles

  • Constructor Details

    • SpecialItem

      SpecialItem(String name, double price, int baseItemRequirement, int addonItemRequirement, int addonItemLimit)
      Creates a new SpecialItem with the specified name, price, base item requirement, addon item requirement, and addon item limit.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the special item.
      price - The price of the special item.
      baseItemRequirement - The amount of base items needed to create the special item.
      addonItemRequirement - The amount of addons needed to create the special item (at least).
      addonItemLimit - The upper limit of the amount of addons the user can add (at most).

    • getAddonItemLimit

      public int getAddonItemLimit()

    • addBase

      public boolean addBase(Item baseItem)
      Adds a base item to the special item.
      Parameters:
      baseItem - The base item to add.
      Returns:
      True if the base item was added successfully, false otherwise.

    • addAddon

      public boolean addAddon(Item addonItem)
      Adds an addon item to the special item.
      Parameters:
      addonItem - The addon item to add.
      Returns:
      True if the addon item was added successfully, false if the addon item limit is reached.
